alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:44PM EDT until September 07 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 644 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Columbia to Brogue to Stewartstown, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Ephrata, Columbia, Lititz, Millersville, Willow Street, Mount Joy, Red Lion, New Holland, Spry, Manheim and East Petersburg. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 270 to 295. Interstate 83 between mile markers 0 and 10, and near mile marker 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
